Hello, I'm Avnish.

I am an Open Source Developer and Engineering Student specializing in Information Technology. Currently I am working as Machine Learning Scientist Intern at Intel Indexer LLC, Berkeley, California. My interests are Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Mathematics. I publish articles to reflect on what I have learned till now and share knowledge. My articles are mostly themed on Mathematics.
